Title: SOAPI.CS
Description:
Soapi.CS is a C# wrapper with full coverage of the Stack Overflow API. 

Soapi.CS is intuitive, fully documented and runs on .Net 3.5/4.0, Silverlight 3/4, Windows Phone 7 and Mono
HomeWiki:
Project Description
Soapi.CS is a C# wrapper with full coverage of the Stack Overflow API.

Soapi.CS is intuitive, fully documented and runs on .Net 3.5/4.0, Silverlight 3/4, Windows Phone 7 and Mono
